code:
sequenceDiagram
actor Dev
participant GitHub
participant Runner
Dev->>GitHub: triggers "Docker Build and Push"
GitHub->>Runner: dispatch
loop Docker Build and Push
Runner->>Runner: job build-and-push
Runner-->>Runner: Checkout code
Runner-->>Runner: Set up Docker Buildx
Runner-->>Runner: Log in to Container Registry
Runner-->>Runner: Extract metadata
Runner-->>Runner: Build and push Docker image
Runner-->>Runner: Test Docker image
end
Dev->>GitHub: triggers "Codebase Mindmap"
GitHub->>Runner: dispatch
loop Codebase Mindmap
Runner->>Runner: job build
Runner-->>Runner: Checkout
Runner-->>Runner: Setup Node.js
Runner-->>Runner: Install markmap-cli
Runner-->>Runner: Generate Markdown map
Runner-->>Runner: Build Markmap HTML
Runner-->>Runner: Upload artifact (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
Runner-->>Runner: Upload Pages artifact
Runner->>Runner: job deploy
Runner-->>Runner: Deploy to GitHub Pages
end
Dev->>GitHub: triggers "PR Validation"
GitHub->>Runner: dispatch
loop PR Validation
Runner->>Runner: job validate-pr
Runner-->>Runner: Checkout code
Runner-->>Runner: Install PyYAML
Runner-->>Runner: Validate YAML files
Runner-->>Runner: Validate Shell Scripts
end
Dev->>GitHub: triggers "Security Scanning"
GitHub->>Runner: dispatch
loop Security Scanning
Runner->>Runner: job trivy-scan
Runner-->>Runner: Checkout code
Runner-->>Runner: Run Trivy vulnerability scanner in repo mode
Runner-->>Runner: Upload Trivy results to GitHub Security
Runner->>Runner: job docker-scan
Runner-->>Runner: Checkout code
Runner-->>Runner: Build Docker image
Runner-->>Runner: Run Trivy on Docker image
Runner-->>Runner: Upload Docker scan results
Runner->>Runner: job secret-scan
Runner-->>Runner: Checkout code
Runner-->>Runner: TruffleHog OSS
end
repo_description: AegisNet: An advanced, integrated defense solution leveraging AI, autonomous drones, and advanced detection systems for comprehensive situational awareness and security.

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 明白了，triggers "Docker Build and Push"、dispatch就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理job build-and-push、triggers "Codebase Mindmap"？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是job build-and-push、triggers "Codebase Mindmap"应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，job build-and-push、triggers "Codebase Mindmap"的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: job build-and-push、triggers "Codebase Mindmap"和另一个方案相比，优势在于...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理job build、job deploy？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，job build、job deploy是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: job build、job deploy和另一个方案相比，优势在于...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，job build、job deploy是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 关于triggers "PR Validation"、dispatch，你有什么想法？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我同意这个观点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将job validate-pr、triggers "Security Scanning"分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 好的，那就按这个方案。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理job validate-pr、triggers "Security Scanning"？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，job validate-pr、triggers "Security Scanning"的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含dispatch、job trivy-scan这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，dispatch、job trivy-scan是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将dispatch、job trivy-scan分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 关于job docker-scan、job secret-scan，你有什么想法？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 这个设计看起来不错。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理job docker-scan、job secret-scan？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达job docker-scan、job secret-scan结束。
